content: christmas star ornament crochet pattern by vivian mcintyre supplies - 4 weight yarn in 2 colors - 4 5 mm crochet hook - stitch marker - scissors - darning needle abbreviations us terms - mc magic_ring - single_crochet single_crochet - double_crochet double_crochet - chain chain - slip_stitch slip_stitch stitch guide - single_crochet insert hook into stitch yarn over and pull through yarn over and pull through both loops - double_crochet yarn over insert hook into stitch yarn over and pull through the stitch yarn over and pull through two loops yarn over and pull through the last two loops - chain yarn over and pull through the loop on the hook - slip_stitch insert hook into stitch yarn over and pull through the stitch and the loop on the hook instructions round 1 using color a in a mc 3dc ch3 x5 slip_stitch into the first double_crochet to close the round round 2 using color b turn your work and ch3 in the chain space dc2 ch3 dc3 in each remaining chain space work 3dc ch3 3dc slip_stitch into the top of the ch3 to close the round round 3 using color a turn your work and ch1 sc1 in the space between the double_crochet clusters of round 2 in the chain space dc4 ch4 dc4 sc1 between the clusters of round 2 then work dc4 ch4 dc4 in the next chain space repeat this pattern 3 more times around the star slip_stitch into the first single_crochet round 4 using color b turn your work and ch1 sc1 in each stitch up to the chain space and single_crochet 5 in the chain space sc1 in each stitch and sc5 in each chain space all around the star slip_stitch into the first stitch of the round and fasten_off weave in ends optional tie a slipknot with yarn of choice and ch30 tie off place through any of the chain spaces and tie together to make a string to hang your new ornament from or just place your ornament on a wire ornament hanger
